T04sanss13u:4: punar aparaṃ kulaputra bodhisatvâivaṃ kāye smṛtim upasthāpayati |
T04sanss13u:18: tasya kāyaparijñānahetor na bhūyaḥ kvacit smṛtiḥ prasarati |
T04sanss13u:29: āgantukair vyavahārair vyavahriyate kāyêti dehêti bhogêti āśrayêti śarīram iti kuṇapêti āyatanam iti |
T04sanss13u:34: anityo vatâyaṃ kāyo 'cirasthitiko maraṇaparyavasānêti jñātvā na kāyahetor viṣamayā jīvati
T04sanss13u:40: so 'nityaḥ kāyêti sarvasatvānāṃ dāsatvaśiṣyatvam abhyupagamya kiṅkaraṇīyatāyai utsuko bhavati
T04sanss13u:41: anityaḥ kāyêti sarvakāya doṣavaṅkaśāṭhyakuhanāṃ na karoti |
T04sanss13u:42: anityaḥ kāyêti jīvitenâśvāsaprāpto jīvitahetor api pāpaṃ karma na karoti |
T04sanss13u:43: anityaḥ kāyêti bhogeṣu tṛṣṇâdhyavasānaṃ na karoti |
T04sanss13u:45: punar aparaṃ kulaputra bodhisatvaḥ kāye kāyânudarśanasmṛtyupasthānaṃ bhāvayan sarvasatvakāyāṃs tatra svakāyae upanibadhnāti |
T04sanss13u:48: yathā ca tathāgatakāye nâśravas tathā svakāyadharmatāṃ pratyavekṣate |
T04sanss13u:49: so nâśravadharmatākuśalaḥ sarvasatvakāyān api tallakṣaṇān eva prajānātîty
T04sanss13u:90: prajñāyamānaḥ sa hi bālabuddhiḥ viṣṭhāghaṭaṃ yāti vahan vicetāḥ ||
T04sanss13u:94: kas tatra rāgo bahumānatā vā ||aṅgāram ādāya yathā hi bālo |
T04sanss13u:96: yāti kṣayaṃ nâiva tu śuklabhāvaṃ bālasya buddhir vitathâbhimānā ||
T04sanss13u:97: evaṃ hi yaḥ caukṣamatir manuṣyaḥ caukṣaṃ kariṣye 'ham idaṃ śarīram |
T04sanss13u:98: sûdvartitaṃ tīrthaśatâbhiṣiktaṃ yāti kṣayaṃ mṛtyuvaśād acaukṣam ||
T04sanss13u:101: prasravan bodhisatvena kāyaḥ pratyavekṣitavyo nava vraṇamukhair yāvat |
T04sanss13u:109: asvâdhīno bodhisatvena kāyaḥ pratyavekṣitavyaḥ annapānasaṃbhūtêti vistaraḥ
T04sanss13u:111: vedanā smṛtyupasthānaṃ tu yathā tāvad āryaratnacūḍasūtre |
T04sanss13u:112: iha kulaputra bodhisatvo vedanāsu vedanânupaśyanāsmṛtyupasthānaṃ bhāvayan veditasukhâśriteṣu satveṣu mahākaruṇāṃ pratilabhate |
T04sanss13u:114: tat sukhaṃ yatra veditaṃ nâsti sa sarvasatvaveditaprahāṇāya vedanāsu vedanāsmṛtyupasthānaṃ bhāvayati |
T04sanss13u:119: sa yāṃ kāṃcid vedanāṃ vedayate tāṃ sarvāṃ mahākaruṇāparigṛhītāṃ vedayate |
T04sanss13u:120: sa yadā sukhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayate tadā rāgacariteṣu satveṣu mahākaruṇāṃ pratilabhate ātmanaś ca rāgânuśayaṃ pratijahāti |
T04sanss13u:121: yadā duṣkhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayate tadā dveṣacariteṣu satveṣu mahākaruṇāṃ pratilabhate ātmanaś ca doṣânuśayaṃ prajahāti |
T04sanss13u:122: yadâduṣkhâsukhāṃ vedanāṃ mohacariteṣu satyeṣu mahākaruṇāṃ pratilabhate |
T04sanss13u:131: sa yāṃ kāñcid vedanāṃ vetti sarvāṃ tām anityaveditāṃ vetti |
T04sanss13u:137: iti hi yat sukhaṃ tad anityaṃ yad duṣkhaṃ sukham eva tat |
T04sanss13u:138: yad aduṣkhâsukhaṃ tad anātmakam ity ādi ||
T04sanss13u:140: duṣkhayā vedanayā spṛṣṭaḥ sarvapāpâkṣaṇôpapanneṣu satveṣu mahākaruṇām utpādayati ||
T04sanss13u:141: pe ||api tu khalu punar abhiniveśo vedanā parigraho vedanôpādānaṃ
T04sanss13u:142: vedanôpalambho vedanā viparyāso vedanā vikalpo vedanêty ādi ||
T04sanss13u:146: vedako vedanād anyaḥ pṛthagbhūto na vidyate ||
T04sanss13u:148: yathā bodhis tathā hy eṣā śāntā śuddhā prabhāsvarā ||
T04sanss13u:153: rajyati vā duṣyati vā muhyati vā |
T04sanss13u:160: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa nâdhyātmaṃ na bahirdhā nôbhayam antareṇôpalabhyate |
T04sanss13u:161: cittaṃ hi kāśyapârūpam anidarśanam apratigham avijñaptikam apratiṣṭham
T04sanss13u:164: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa sarvabuddhair na dṛṣṭaṃ |
T04sanss13u:165: na paśyanti na drakṣyanti yat sarvabuddhair na dṛṣṭaṃ |na paśyanti na drakṣyanti |
T04sanss13u:168: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa māyāsadṛśam abhūtaparikalpanayā vividhām upapattiṃ parigṛhṇāti ||pe ||
T04sanss13u:169: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa nadīsrotaḥsadṛśam anavasthitam utpannabhagnavilīnaṃ |
T04sanss13u:170: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa dīpârcciḥsadṛśaṃ hetupratyayatayā pravartate |
T04sanss13u:172: cittaṃ hi kāśyapâkāśasadṛśam āgantukaiḥ kleśair upakliśyate |
T04sanss13u:175: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa matsyabaḍiśasadṛśaṃ duṣkhe sukhasaṃjñayā |
T04sanss13u:184: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa sparśârāmaṃ makṣikêva tailapātre |
T04sanss13u:185: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa parigaveṣyamāṇaṃ na labhyate |
T04sanss13u:187: yan nôpalabhyate tan nâivâtītaṃ nânāgataṃ na pratyutpannaṃ |
T04sanss13u:188: yan nâivâtītaṃ nânāgataṃ na pratyutpannaṃ tat tryadhvasamatikrāntaṃ |
T04sanss13u:189: yat tryadhvasamatikrāntaṃ tan nêvâsti na nâstîty ādi ||
T04sanss13u:192: sa cittaṃ parigaveṣamāṇo nâdhyātmaṃ cittaṃ samanupaśyati |
T04sanss13u:193: na bahirdhā cittaṃ samanupaśyati |na skandheṣu cittaṃ samanupaśyati |
T04sanss13u:198: tasyâivaṃ bhavati ālambane sati cittam utpadyate |
T04sanss13u:200: atha yad evâlambanaṃ tad eva cittaṃ |
T04sanss13u:201: yadi tāvad anyad ālambanam anyac cittaṃ |
T04sanss13u:203: atha yad evâlambanaṃ tad eva cittaṃ |
T04sanss13u:209: na tenâivâṅguly-agreṇa tad evâṅguly-agraṃ spraṣṭuṃ śakyate |
T04sanss13u:210: nâiva cittena tad eva cittaṃ śakyate draṣṭum ||
T04sanss13u:211: pe ||punar aparaṃ kulaputra yad upadrutapradrutânavasthitapracārasya vānaramārutasadṛśasya
T04sanss13u:213: dūraṃgamacāriṇo 'śarīrasya laghuparivartino viṣayalolasya ṣaḍāyatanagocarasyâparâparasaṃprayuktasya cittasyâvasthānām ekâgratâśaraṇam aviśaraṇaṃ śamathâikâgratâvikṣepêty ucyate cittasya smṛtir
T04sanss13u:221: yat punaḥ sarvasvaṃ parityajya sarvabuddhakṣetrapariśuddhaye pariṇāmayatîtîyam ucyate viṭhapanêty ādi ||
T04sanss13u:223: dharme dharmânudarśī viharan bodhisatvo na kañcid dharmaṃ samanupaśyati |
T04sanss13u:224: yato na buddhadharmā yato na bodhiḥ |
T04sanss13u:225: yato na mārgo yato na niḥsaraṇaṃ |
T04sanss13u:226: sa sarvadharmâniḥsaraṇam iti viditvânāvaraṇaṃ nāma mahākaruṇāsamādhiṃ samāpadyate |
T04sanss13u:227: sa sarvadharmeṣu sarvakleśeṣu ca kṛtrimasaṃjñāṃ pratilabhate |
T04sanss13u:234: na rāgabhāvo na dveṣabhāvo na mohabhāva |
T04sanss13u:236: yat svabhāvāś ca kleśās tat svabhāvā bodhir ity evaṃ smṛtim
T04sanss13u:238: iha kulaputra bodhisatvasya dharme dharmânupaśyanā smṛtyupasthānena viharatâivaṃ bhavati |
T04sanss13u:241: na punar atra kaścid ātmabhāve satvo vā jīvo vā jantur vā poṣo vā puruṣo vā pudgalo vā manujo vā yo jāyate vā jīryate vā cyavate vôtpadyate vā |
T04sanss13u:248: yante tādṛśāḥ samudāgacchanti kuśalā vâkuśalā vā
T04sanss13u:252: na câhetukānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ kācid utpattir ity ādi ||
T04sanss13u:254: sa kiyadgambhīrān api dharmān pratyavekṣamāṇas tāṃ sarvajñatābodhicittânusmṛtiṃ na vijahāti ||āryalalitavistarasūtre 'py
T04sanss13u:258: saṃskāra pralopa dharmime varṣakāli calitaṃ vilepanaṃ |
T04sanss13u:262: anavasthitamārutôpamāḥ phenapiṇḍāvad asāradurbalāḥ ||saṃskāra nirīha śūnyakāḥ kadalīskandhasamā nirīkṣataḥ |
T04sanss13u:264: hetūbhi ca pratyayebhi vā sarva saṃskāragataṃ pravartate |
T04sanss13u:265: anyonyapratītyahetutaḥ tad idaṃ bālajano na budhyate ||
T04sanss13u:266: yathā muñja pratītya balbajaṃ rajju vyāyāmabalena vartitā |
T04sanss13u:267: ghaṭiyantra sacakra vartate teṣv ekâikaśu nâsti vartanā ||
T04sanss13u:269: ekâikaśu teṣu vartanī pūrvâparântato nôpalabhyate ||bījasya sato yathâṅkuro na ca yo bīja sa câivâṅkuro |
T04sanss13u:270: na cânya tato na câiva tat |
T04sanss13u:273: saṃskārâvidyapratyayāḥ te ca saṃskāra na santi tatvataḥ |
T04sanss13u:274: saṃskārâvidya câiva hi śūnyâite prakṛtī nirīhakāḥ ||
T04sanss13u:275: mudrāt pratimudra dṛśyate mudrasaṃkrānti na côpalabhyate |
T04sanss13u:276: na ca tatra na câiva sānyato evaṃ saṃskāranucchedaśāśvatāḥ ||
T04sanss13u:277: cakṣuś ca pratītya rūpataḥ cakṣu vijñānam ihôpajāyate |
T04sanss13u:278: na ca cakṣuṣi rūpaniśritaṃ rūpasaṃkrānti na câiva cakṣuṣi ||
T04sanss13u:279: nairātmyaśubhāś ca dharmime te punar ātmêti śubhāś ca kalpitāḥ |
T04sanss13u:282: akahiñci gatam anāgataṃ śūnya māyôpama yogi paśyati ||
T04sanss13u:287: iti pratyayato 'gni jāyate jātu kṛtukāryu laghū nirudhyate ||
T04sanss13u:288: atha paṇḍitu kaści mārgate kuta yam āgatu kutra yāti vā |
T04sanss13u:289: vidiśo diśi sarva mārgato na gatir nâpy agatiś ca labhyate ||
T04sanss13u:291: sāmagri tu satvasūcanā sā ca paramârthatu nôpalabhyate ||
T04sanss13u:292: kaṇṭhâuṣṭha pratītya tālukaṃ jihva parivartir avarti akṣarā |
T04sanss13u:293: na ca kaṇṭhagatā na tālukaiḥ akṣarâikâika tu nôpalabhyate ||
T04sanss13u:294: sāmagripratītyaś ca sā vācam anubudhivaśena niścarī |
T04sanss13u:297: kṣaṇikāṃ vaśikāṃ tad īdṛśīṃ sarvavācaḥ pratiśrutakôpamāḥ ||
T04sanss13u:299: yatha tantri pratītya dāru ca hastavyāyāmatrayebhi saṃgatim |
T04sanss13u:301: atha paṇḍitu kaści mārgate kuto 'yam āgatu kutra yāti vā |
T04sanss13u:302: vidiśo diśa sarvamārgataḥ śabdam anāgamanaṃ na labhyate ||
T04sanss13u:303: tatha hetubhi pratyayebhi ca sarvasaṃskāragataṃ pravartate |
T04sanss13u:304: yogī puna bhūtadarśanāt śūnya saṃskāra nirīha paśyati ||
T04sanss13u:309: śūnyatā na kvacid devā na nāgā nâpi rākṣasāḥ ||
T04sanss13u:310: manuṣyā vâmanuṣyā vā sarve tu eṣa vidyate |
T04sanss13u:311: nāmnā hi nāmatā śūnyā nāmni nāma na vidyate ||
T04sanss13u:312: anāmakāḥ sarve dharmāḥ nāmnā tu paridīpitāḥ ||
T04sanss13u:313: yo hi svabhāvo nāmno vai na sa dṛṣṭo na ca śrutaḥ |
T04sanss13u:314: na côtpanno niruddho vā kasya nāmêha pṛcchasi ||
